name: BulletRide
description:
Its BulletRide - platformer without platforms. You jump on bullets! Defeat the Boss!

Game made for GMTK GameJam2018. Its my second game and i made it in 3 hours. Please rate it!

Controls: 

Move: A and D

Jump: W

Shoot: Hold RMB

When you touch the bullet, you jump automatically, but you also have second jump.

You can jump only on blue bullets, red bullets are dangerous!

Dont fall!
